com.facebook.buck.cxx

Class DebugPathSanitizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cxx.DebugPathSanitizer

  • public class DebugPathSanitizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates all the logic to sanitize debug paths in native code. Currently, this just supports sanitizing the compilation directory that compilers typically embed in binaries when including debug sections (e.g. using "-g" with gcc/clang inserts the compilation directory in the DW_AT_comp_dir DWARF field).

    • Constructor Detail

      • DebugPathSanitizer

        public DebugPathSanitizer(int pathSize,
                  char separator,
                  java.nio.file.Path compilationDirectory,
                  ImmutableBiMap<java.nio.file.Path,java.nio.file.Path> other)
        Parameters:
        pathSize - fix paths to this size for in-place replacements.
        separator - the path separator used to fill paths aren't of pathSize length.
        compilationDirectory - the desired path to replace the actual compilation directory with.

                        java.lang.String contents)
        Parameters:
        workingDir - the current working directory, if applicable.
        contents - the string to sanitize.
        Returns:
